title: Interpretation of a dream when you see someone screaming at you in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone shouting at you in a dream, and screaming in reality is an expression of a feeling of anger. A person usually screams in his life and the same is true in a dream where the sleeper expresses his negative feelings during his forced sleep. This dream carries secrets, according to the opinions of interpreters about this vision. It turns out that it has many repercussions and we will find out whether it is good or not. During this article, the interpretation of a dream about seeing someone yelling at you in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which you see someone screaming at you. About Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin is the main and important reference when interpreting any of the different dreams. . As for his interpretation of the dream of screaming, we will discuss it through the following points: If a family member is seen screaming, this may symbolize that a member of this family will die in the coming period, and God Almighty knows best. But if the dreamer sees his partner crying in the dream, this indicates that his companion is in the next stage. He is expected to face a problem that will seriously affect him. When the dreamer saw a lot of people screaming, this indicates that these people will ask him for help. While if a wild animal screams in a dream, this indicates that this person will face a difficult problem in the future. Interpretation of a dream in which you see someone screaming. See also: Interpretation of a dream in which you see crying over the separation of your lover in a dream. A dream in which you see someone screaming at you about a married woman. As is the case with the interpretation of any dream, interpreters give different interpretations of it, and here we will see the interpretation of a dream about marrying someone screaming as follows: Next: In general, the dream of a married woman screaming in her dream indicates that she will end and get rid of her sorrows. Then save her from her ordeals and distresses, and God Almighty will bless her with comfort, with His permission. This dream is also evidence of the end and disappearance of all disturbances and troubles in her home. Which leads to a change And improving her husband’s conditions and circumstances and relieving him of distress and distress by the command of God Almighty. On the other hand, if a married woman sees in her dream that one of her sons is screaming. There is no doubt that this symbolizes the concern of the married woman, the one who had the vision, for her children. Also, the same vision It indicates how much she cares about them and is constantly thinking about them. Interpretation of a dream in which she sees someone screaming. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing crying in detail in a grave. Seeing someone screaming at you in an individual dream. Seeing a single girl screaming in her dream has many interpretations provided by interpretation scholars, and we will work to clarify this interpretation. As follows: If a single woman sees in her dream that someone is shouting at her. There is no doubt that this dream symbolizes the imminent moment for the girl who imagines hearing happy and enjoyable news, events, and news. Or perhaps she will rejoice and rejoice at the arrival of good news for her, and this news carries with it good tidings for her coming days. Also, seeing someone screaming indicates the existence of a good relationship. This relationship is based on love and tenderness between this girl and the person she is screaming at in the dream. It is worth noting here that this vision could be a warning bell for this single girl. The warning is about that person. To draw attention

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the whiteness of the body in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a white body in a dream. Interpretation of a vision. A white body in a dream depends on the physical strength and psychological comfort that the dreamer enjoys. If a person sees in a dream that his body has increased whiteness and shine, this means that he will enter a new job. Also, seeing a white body in a dream indicates obedience. God Almighty and the good of the seer. Interpretation of a dream about whiteness of the body in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that her body is turning white, this indicates that some things have gone wrong in her life. Also, increasing the body indicates food, blessing, and an abundance of goodness for the dreamer and marriage. Close for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing the white of a man’s body in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates excellence and success in education and work in her life. Seeing the naked body of an unmarried girl indicates her marriage to a man with religious morals and a dignified relationship with God. Interpretation of a dream about a white body in a dream For a pregnant woman, seeing the whiteness of the body in a pregnant girl’s dream means that she will soon give birth to a male child and the pain of pregnancy will go away. Also, an increase in body weight indicates success and overcoming crises in the coming period. The interpretation that the color of the cheek turns white indicates that the person with insight has acquired honor and dignity. And high honour. Interpretation of a dream about whiteness of the body in a dream for a married woman. If a married girl sees the color white in her dream, this indicates many good things that she will experience. Seeing a whitened body in a married girl’s dream indicates happiness between her and her husband, and an oasis for the mind. Seeing a burning body In a married woman’s dream, it means that she will be exposed to many crises and many problems. And seeing the removal of body hair actually indicates family disputes between the married girl and her husband’s family. Interpretation of a dream about the whiteness of the body in a man’s dream. The interpretation of seeing the whiteness of a woman’s body in a dream indicates his close marriage with her and the removal of worries and problems. Seeing the whiteness of a girl’s body in a man’s dream indicates immorality and sins committed by the dreamer in reality. The whiteness of the face in an unmarried person’s dream indicates the payment of his debts, and indicates relief if he is unjustly imprisoned. Cleansing the body in a dream indicates getting rid of sins and repenting to God. The Almighty from sins. Interpretation of a dream about my white hand in a dream. Seeing a white hand in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the approaching date of a marriage contract with the boy of her dreams. Seeing a man holding his white hand in a dream indicates the superiority of a genius in his scientific life. Also, seeing a married woman holding her husband’s hand White foot in a dream indicates the solution of all her problems and worries. Likewise, if a married man sees himself in a dream eating with his white hand, this means that he has committed sin and misdeeds. Interpretation of a dream about white feetInterpretation of a girl who sees that her legs have become whiter, this indicates the great goodness that You will get it. A married woman who sees herself having white legs is evidence of pregnancy and childbirth. This vision also indicates to the man some important things that will change his life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing a nearby voice

preview.html: Hearing the voice of a relative in a dream. Seeing and hearing news of the death of a relative means hearing good news. Perhaps it indicates the strength of the love between the monarch and this person. It may indicate medicines for diseases. This also means that the fortuneteller is going through a harsh experience. Seeing the death of a friend in a dream When you dream of the death of a friend in a dream, he cries, so it is an indication of the strength The dreamer's love for this person and his intense attachment to him. It may indicate that the dreamer is a loved person around him in his field of work and family. But when a person dreams that he is crying loudly and loudly over the death of his friend, this is a sign of the difficulties and difficult tests that the viewer is going through and cannot Getting out of it. The dream has another meaning, which is recovery from illness. It also indicates relief and great wealth. The meaning of dreaming about the death of a friend during a period of rivalry. When a person dreams that he heard the news of his friend’s death and quarreled with him, this indicates the end of the quarrel between them and the return of relations as is and better. Interpretation of a dream about crying over The death of a friend. Whoever sees that he is crying and screaming loudly about the death of his friend indicates the death of the friend in reality, and God knows best. As for whoever sees that he is screaming and tearing his clothes out of grief for his friend, this is evidence of that. Corruption of religion for the dreamer. The meaning of the death of an enemy in a dream. Whoever sees the death of his enemy in a dream shows that the end of deeds Hostility between them. It also means reconciliation between them and starting a new work. The meaning of the death of a husband in a dream. Seeing the death of one of the spouses in a dream means separation and final divorce between them. But sometimes it is a reflection of the viewer’s feeling of anxiety and fear of the separation of the other party. The meaning of the death of a child in a dream in the event that you see the death of a male child in In a dream, this is a sign of collecting money from inheritance. And if you see the death of your daughter, this indicates that he will be saved from a great evil that befell him. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing exposed buttocks in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of the descent of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Roy2a.com, where we will discuss in this article the interpretation of this vision for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man, and a young man. What is the interpretation of seeing the buttocks exposed in a dream according to Al-Usaimi: Seeing exposed buttocks in a dream is a bad dream that indicates fear, tension, corruption of morals, and God’s intense wrath upon him. Seeing a man’s buttocks exposed in a dream is a sign of loneliness, depression, and a feeling of disappointment and distance from others. Seeing the buttocks in a dream indicates weakness of character, loss of confidence in oneself and others, and complete withdrawal from others. People. Seeing exposed buttocks in a dream is a sign of improving the fortuneteller’s circumstances and changing his life for the better. Seeing blood flowing from the back in a dream is a sign of exhaustion, exhaustion, and exposure to a psychological crisis as a result of severe pressure. Seeing a single girl exposing her buttocks in a dream is a sign of people’s distance from her and her feeling of loneliness. Seeing a woman exposing her back in a dream is an indication of the many problems and pressures in her life. Seeing a stranger’s buttocks in a dream is a sign of the presence of many bad friends in their lives and their plans to harm and hurt her. What is the interpretation of seeing buttocks exposed in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman exposing her buttocks In a dream, it indicates that she will be free from the pain of pregnancy and childbirth, and that she and her fetus will enjoy better health and well-being. Seeing worms coming out from the back in a dream is a sign of good health and quick recovery from all diseases. Seeing falling on the back in a dream is a sign that he does not bear any responsibility and is exposing himself to a big scandal in front of others and people who hate him. title: Interpretation of lemon juice in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of lemons by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams. Lemons. Lemons in a dream indicate illness, if they are yellow in color. As for seeing green lemons in a dream, this means good luck and abundance of sustenance. Dreaming of a lemon tree in a dream indicates a righteous person. Seeing sour lemons for Nabulsi. A dream about picking lemons from trees indicates If it is ripe, this indicates valuable things that he will obtain. Lemon juice inside the dream. If it is eaten, it shows the problem that the dreamer is going through. As for drinking lemon juice, it is an indication of good events. A dream of lemons for single people. A lemon tree in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of parents. And what is happening with them. Yellow lemons in a dream indicate this girl’s jealousy. Lemon juice in a dream indicates this girl’s exhaustion. Seeing lemons for a married woman. Seeing green sour lemons in a dream is a sign of goodness that will come to her and her family. As for picking lemons from trees in a dream It indicates pregnancy in the near future. Dreaming of yellow lemons in a dream is a sign of sadness and excessive fatigue. Dreaming of lemons for a pregnant woman. Seeing lemons in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the remaining period of childbirth. Seeing green lemons for a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence of the presence of a newborn male. Tree Lemons for a pregnant woman are evidence of the soonest date of childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about lemons for a man: Seeing a man in a dream collecting lemons The green color indicates receiving many benefits and things of value. Picking sour lemons in a dream indicates money and abundant food. As for seeing a lemon in a dream that has not been eaten, it indicates... The profits that the dreamer earns from the trade in which he works. Lemon trees in the dream, whether small or large, indicate the blessing that the dreamer will receive and the happiness that he will live with his wife. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it. .

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Hadroun in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing reptiles in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Ali pointed out that seeing reptiles in a dream are disturbing dreams, indicating anguish and anguish. Also, seeing a lizard in a dream is evidence of the presence of a devil or jinn, so it is a sign of envy and witchcraft, God forbid. Seeing reptiles in a dream indicates many It is one of the problems that the dreamer suffers from in his life. Likewise, seeing a gecko in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that the owner of this vision is committing crime and immorality. The interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream shows greed among people, and also indicates mistreatment. Harthoon in a dream For an unmarried woman: The interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that the enemy is pursuing her and wants to harm her, so she should be careful. Also, seeing someone bitten by a ferret in a dream is one of the unwanted visions that means death and misfortunes. Seeing an unmarried woman carrying a trick in a dream indicates To deception and deception by someone in her life. Seeing reptiles in a dream is one of the dreams of unmarried women about difficulties, problems, spiteful and envious people. Hardon in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream is a sign of a deceitful and cunning person who wants to harm and harm her. Also Seeing a lizard in a dream for a married woman is painful and sad, and it is a sign of illness and extreme fatigue. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman who died, as this indicates many problems in her married life. Killing a harthon in a dream for a married woman is one of the desired visions and a sign of her great righteousness and justice in the situation. Pregnant woman In a dream: The interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream means that she will suffer from illness and fatigue during pregnancy. Also, seeing a herring disc in a dream for a pregnant woman is not good and indicates that her birth will not be completed well. Harths and reptiles in a dream for a pregnant woman are undesirable, but killing it indicates Victory and overcoming fatigue. Hardoon in a dream about a man. The interpretation of seeing Hardoon in a man’s dream indicates an arrogant enemy and indicates that there is someone pursuing this dreamer. Killing reptiles and reptiles in a dream is one of the good visions for people, which is the victory of that person over his enemies. Seeing Hardoon killed in a dream reported Dream Interpretation Scholars say that seeing the killing of Harathon in a dream indicates the end of problems and salvation from disasters. Harathon leaving someone’s house in his dream indicates his divorce or his distancing himself from a corrupt and disabled woman. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond You as soon as possible.

Killing a harthon in a dream for a married woman is one of the desired visions and a sign of her great righteousness and justice in the situation. Pregnant woman In a dream: The interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream means that she will suffer from illness and fatigue during pregnancy. Also, seeing a herring disc in a dream for a pregnant woman is not good and indicates that her birth will not be completed well. Harths and reptiles in a dream for a pregnant woman are undesirable, but killing it indicates Victory and overcoming fatigue. Hardoon in a dream about a man. The interpretation of seeing Hardoon in a man’s dream indicates an arrogant enemy and indicates that there is someone pursuing this dreamer. Killing reptiles and reptiles in a dream is one of the good visions for people, which is the victory of that person over his enemies. Seeing Hardoon killed in a dream reported Dream Interpretation Scholars say that seeing the killing of Harathon in a dream indicates the end of problems and salvation from disasters. Harathon leaving someone’s house in his dream indicates his divorce or his distancing himself from a corrupt and disabled woman. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond You as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about urinating and urinating in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of seeing a dream about urinating and urinating in a dream, and urinating in a dream is one of the common dreams that raise doubts and fears of opinion.Interpretation of the appearance of urine by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a person urinating in a dream is a sign of his losing control over himself and his actions, and this requires reconsidering his actions. Seeing urination in a dream can be a good sign and earning a lot of money in the future. Whoever dreams of urinating on him, this indicates that this person will help him. Whoever sees in a dream that urine is spilling everywhere, this indicates the dreamer’s fears about the future and losing money. Or a specific position. In general, seeing urine in a dream indicates a lot of money and good luck. Interpretation of the appearance of urination on clothes by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that whoever sees himself urinating on his clothes or urinating in front of him, this indicates that he suffers from many problems that force him to Act wisely and resolve it, and it may indicate wasting money elsewhere. And it may indicate the need to pay attention to one’s health. Interpretation of dreams about involuntary urination for a married and unmarried pregnant woman. A married woman who dreams of urinating on the bed indicates that she will become pregnant and give birth to a man. And the pregnant woman that she sees in the dream is urinating in the mosque, or her husband is urinating in the mosque, this indicates that May God bless her with good offspring and memorize the Holy Qur’an. An unmarried woman who sees in a dream that she is urinating on herself, this indicates the approach of marriage and getting rid of the problems she faces in her life. In general, anyone who sees himself urinating in a public place, this indicates big money and savings. The abundant wealth they achieve and the more they urinate. A single or married man urinates in a dream. Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted the vision of an unmarried or married man urinating in a dream as indicating a great benefit that he will gain. For a debtor who sees in a dream that he is urinating on his bed, this is a sign of repaying the debt, and he will be discharged. The prisoner is relieved of his distress and is released from prison, and the poor person does the same. Placing it is easier. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing urination in a dream. The interpretation of urine varies depending on the situation in which the urine appears. Al-Nabulsi explained that whoever sees himself urinating milk indicates earning money from a lawful source. Anyone who drinks urine in a dream is a sign of good faith. Whoever sees in a dream that it is warm urine or fire will have great importance. And whoever urinates from his penis and comes out in the form of a bird, this indicates that God He will be blessed with a good son. Whoever urinates and takes out a pen in a dream, this indicates that his son is blessed with intelligence and abundant knowledge. Changing the color of urine in a dream is a sign of an excess. Therefore, we present to you all possible interpretations of seeing urine in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and a hand to interpret it, we We welcome your comments at the end of the article.

title: I dreamed that I was taking an exam and I did not know the answer

preview.html: I dreamed that I was taking an exam and did not know the answer through the Vision roy2a.com website. One of the common dreams among people is the dream of not being able to take an exam, which makes the viewer suffer from a kind of anxiety and confusion about the meanings of this dream and what it symbolizes. Today, through this article, I will say: “I dreamed that I was taking an exam and I did not know the answer,” according to great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and others. From dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the dreamer, whether he is male, single, or married. I dreamed that I was taking an exam and did not know how to answer Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained the vision of taking an exam and not being able to answer it as a dream, and it indicates that something bad will happen in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. Success In exams in a dream, it appears that the dreamer is a sick person who has the ability to bear all the responsibilities and difficulties in his life. Not passing exams in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s distance from his Lord and his lack of prayer and worship. Seeing an exam paper in black in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face many problems and difficulties. In the coming period. See also: Interpretation of seeing an exam in a dream. I dreamed that I was taking an exam and did not know how to answer Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing taking an exam and not being able to answer it in a dream shows that the dreamer will face some unpleasant things in his life. Not answering the exam states that the dreamer must He clings to worship and closeness to God. Seeing success in an exam in a dream indicates the ability of the visionary to bear all the problems and crises that he is going through and his ability to overcome them. See also: Interpretation of seeing an exam board in a dream. I dreamed that I was taking an exam and did not know how to answer the song. Seeing a single woman taking the exam. She cannot answer it in a dream, which indicates that her marriage may be long, and God knows best. Failing exams in a dream for single people shows that the coming period of her life will be filled with many successes and excellence. Success in exams in a single’s dream indicates the approaching date of her wedding, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was taking an exam. I do not know the answer for a married woman. Seeing a married woman taking an exam and unable to answer in a dream indicates that he will face major financial problems in the coming period. Failing exams in a dream for a married woman indicates that he is living a married life full of stability, happiness, and kindness. Success in exams in a dream for a married woman indicates that God He will get her pregnant soon, and God knows best. See also: Congratulations on the success. I dreamed that I was taking an exam and I did not know the pregnant woman’s answer. The dream about the pregnant woman taking the exam and not being able to answer indicates that she will undergo a difficult and difficult birth process, and God knows best. Success in the examination in the pregnancy dream shows that she went through an easy birth process without She shows no fatigue or pain. I dreamed that I was taking an exam and I did not know how to answer the man. Seeing a man taking the exam and not being able to answer it shows that in the coming days disputes and disagreements will arise between him.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing potatoes or potatoes in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing potatoes or potatoes in a dream and its effects. People are creative in presenting dishes with many recipes and flavors using abundant vegetables, including potatoes, which are used in many varieties and which have an important role in decorating the table and stimulating the appetite. In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of dreaming of seeing potatoes or potatoes in a dream and its repercussions. Interpretation The dream of seeing potatoes or potatoes in a dream and its consequences. Of course, this vision differs in the interpretations it contains, and this is based on what we see in the dream in various details, and in this context we will learn about it. The interpretation of the dream of seeing potatoes or potatoes in a dream and its consequences consists of the following: If someone sees in his dream that he is eating or He is frying potatoes. This vision is evidence of the emergence of many problems and many fears for the person who saw the dream. Whereas if someone sees in his dream that he is cooking potatoes. This is evidence of the disappearance of worries. It is evidence of the beginning of a new stage in the dreamer’s life, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Watch. Also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing rice in a dream and the dream of eating rice in detail. The interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream for a single woman. Many people are interested in learning about these interpretations and meanings contained in the dreams that we see in the dream, especially those that are strange to some. In this context, we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream for a single woman, which is as follows: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating potatoes. This vision is evidence of the occurrence of many health crises, and major psychological crises for the viewer, and it is a warning to her of bad friends and waiting for her. In addition, seeing potatoes in a dream is for a girl who has never been married before. She says She suffers from great physical fatigue and that she may go through many unpleasant events and details. But if a woman sees in her dream burning potatoes. This vision is evidence of delayed marriage, and the eldest daughter’s desire for emotional stability, and God Almighty knows best. While seeing rotten potatoes in The dream is a sign of sins and disobedience, and the dreamer must return to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the sacrifice in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream. Of course, the interpretations involved in seeing potatoes differ, depending on the type of potato in the dream, whether it is ripe or intended. In this context, we learn more about the interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream. It is explained in the following lines: Seeing potatoes in a dream is considered one of the dreams that do not bode well. It is also evidence that the visionary is exposed to many problems and difficulties in life. In addition, if a married woman sees potatoes in In a dream, this is an intention to buy. It is a sign that she will be exposed to a lot of controversy and problems in her married life. As well as seeing raw potatoes in a dream, and they were in large quantities. This dream is evidence that the dreamer will be exposed to many disagreements and problems, as it will take a long time, and God Almighty is higher. And I know. Whereas if a married woman dreams that she is storing potatoes

title: Interpretation of a dream about a spider in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a spider: Seeing a black, white, yellow spider in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, according to Imam al-Sadiq, for a girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a single woman. Interpretation of a spider in a dream: If you see in your dream that you are falling into a spider’s web or traps, this means that you are falling into a mistake or sin. Your struggle with a spider web in a dream indicates your complete rejection of your current situation and that you are trying with all your might to improve your financial and social circumstances. Interpretation of a black spider in a dream: A large black spider in a dream symbolizes the fortuneteller’s beliefs and postulates based on belief in magic and the associated supernatural and metaphysical powers that have no basis in science. Reality, rather, they are threads of dark thoughts and ancient beliefs that were woven around him from childhood until he became aware. From them and sometimes you name or rent them. The black spider also symbolizes Satan in Arab popular imagination. Interpretation of a spider in a dream. Some dream interpreters consider seeing a spider in a dream one of the indicators of the dreamer’s intelligence and uniqueness, or his creative work based on formation and construction, which only occurs in isolation and seclusion. The dreamer or dreamer - in this context - needs a distance that separates him from others to perform a specific creative task that may be related to writing or drawing. Interpretation of a spider climbing in a dream If you see in your dream a spider climbing the wall of your room or house or hanging by its thin thread above your head or body. This is a sign of negative thoughts that control your mind, and they are also thoughts that violate ideals and morals and can push their owner to harm others and lead them to the evil of their actions. Interpretation of spider thread in a dream: As for the thin spider thread, it almost resembles the hair of Muawiyah bin Abi Sufyan, the Umayyad caliph and the great companion who had the revelation, and it is considered The greatest political acumen in Arab-Islamic history. Muawiyah replied: As happened in other cities: I do not place my sword where my whip is sufficient for me, and I do not place my whip where my tongue is sufficient for me, and if there is a hair between me and the people that has not been cut, they will thin it if they cut it. If they leave it, I will extend it. Thread or soft hair symbolizes wisdom, communication, good measurement, and management. Interpretation of a spider in one dream: A spider in an unmarried girl’s dream has a meaning: if it is black, it indicates a bad woman, and if it is white, it indicates a distinguished man or a young man. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream a black spider emerging from the folds of her clothes, then an evil woman will attack her, and a spider in her closet shows a woman who flatters her. As for the white spider, it is good because it shows a wise man guarding it. The red spider symbolizes hatred, the yellow is a disease, and the green is an enemy who suddenly becomes a friend. Interpretation of a spider in a dream for a married woman. The black spider in a married woman’s dream also symbolizes the evil of women, the elderly, and female relatives, while A white spider indicates a man’s wisdom and intelligence, a yellow spider in a married woman’s dream is illness, and a green spider indicates goodness or food. Interpretation of a spider in a pregnant woman’s dream
